Job Description: QA Automation Java Automation Selenium and UI Automation   REST automation Postman, Newman etc   Knowledge of Cloud ecosystems AWS, Azure, etc is highly desired    Responsibilities:    Understand and adhere to Information Security policies, guidelines and procedure, practice them for protection of organizational data and Information System.   Take part in information security training and act while handling information.   Report all suspected security and policy breach to Infosec team or appropriate authority(CISO).   Understand and adhere to the additional information security responsibilities as part of the assigned job role.
